code: import React,{useState}from"react";import Botao from"./Botao";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Calculadora(){const[tela,setTela]=useState('');const handleClique=valor=>{if(valor==='='){try{setTela(eval(tela));}catch(error){setTela('Erro');}}else if(valor==='C'){setTela('');}else{setTela(tela+valor);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{padding:'14px',border:'2px solid black',fontSize:'22px',marginBottom:'12px'},children:tela||'0'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:['7','8','9','/'].map(valor=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("botao",{valor:valor,Clique:handleClique},valor))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:['4','5','6','*'].map(valor=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("botao",{valor:valor,Clique:handleClique},valor))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:['1','2','3','-'].map(valor=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("botao",{valor:valor,Clique:handleClique},valor))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:['0','.','=','+'].map(valor=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("botao",{valor:valor,Clique:handleClique},valor))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("botao",{valor:"C",Clique:handleClique})})]});}export default Calculadora;
